articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Opens
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Opens
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia show was opened with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition here on Thursday to celebrate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venue of the show are potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, the flowers of the sun, cultivated by armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, overseas compatriots, diplomatic missions of various countries and missions of  international organizations here, friendship and solidarity organizations and foreign figures with sincerity. 
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kang Nung Su, vice-premier, An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 65th birthday of the WPK, officials of armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, working people here and overseas compatriots. 
					
					 Kim Pyong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Culture and Arts of Korea, said in his opening address that the show would mark a significant occasion in demonstrating the immense national pride and self-esteem of the army and people and overseas compatriots of the DPRK blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and helping more keenly realize the profound reverence of all people for the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Performance Staged by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Performance Staged by State Merited Chorus
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Delegates participating in celebrations of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea now under way here enjoyed a performance given by the State Merited Chorus at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday. 
					The performers in men's choruses "Song of Loyalty" and "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea" and mixed trio and men's chorus "Let Us Present Glory to Our Great Party" and other numbers sang high praises of the immortal exploits General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed by strengthening and developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, exalting the dignity of the country to the highest level and ushering in the greatest heyday of building a rich and powerful country under the banner of Songun.
					
					  Also put on the stage were men's chorus "The General Uses the Art of Shortening Distance", male solo and chorus "We Started from Scratch" and female solo and men's chorus "The Care of Mother Party" and other numbers making the audience look back with deep emotion on the glorious history of the party in which it has adorned the course of the protracted struggle with heroic epic under the leadership of the President and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Its repertoire included the numbers representing the iron faith of all the servicepersons and people to devotedly protect Kim Jong Il and perform uninterrupted miracles and exploits in all fields building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Kindergarteners
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Kindergarteners 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- An art performance "Flower-strewn Stage Celebrating October Holiday" was given by kindergarteners from across the country at the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace Thursday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					  Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Thae Nam, Kim Rak Hui and officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 The performance began with prologue "Fireworks Celebrating October Holiday." Put on the stage were such numbers as boys chorus and drum-beating "He Has Grown to be General of Mt. Paektu" and mixed chorus "Marshal Has Come to Hoeryong". 
					
					 Performers truthfully represented the Korean children happily and stoutly growing, bringing their talents into bloom under the care of the party which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and is led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They reflected their will to grow quickly to become pillars of the country in such numbers as piano, xylophone and percussion instrument solos "We Are Also Juvenile Generals" and callisthenic "I Will Become Football Star".

articles.title: Art Performance Given to Mark Birthday of WPK
articles.content:
Art Performance Given to Mark Birthday of WPK
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday to celebrate the 65th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The performance began with chorus "Glory to Our Great Party". Put on the stage were mixed chorus "The Party Means the Care of the General", chorus and story-telling "The Road We Want to Follow" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Also staged were numbers reflecting the great honor and pride of the youth performing miracles and feats in the van of the drive to effect a revolutionary surge and the faith and will of the youths in the era of Songun to defend the socialist motherland as firm as a rock.
					
					The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed by developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and a powerful vanguard organization of the Songun revolution and leading the cause of building a thriving socialist nation to victory and thereby demonstrating the dignity of the country and its national power.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the youth league and youth and students in the city.

articles.title: Soccer of Sports Festival Begin
articles.content:
Soccer of Sports Festival Begin
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Soccer matches have begun at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on the sidelines of the national sports festival marking the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Participating in the tournament are the premier league teams (ten men's and eight women's) and other six men's and eight women's teams selected from regional preliminaries, thirty-two teams in all.
					
					 Women's matches between the April 25 and Sinhungsan teams and between the Wolmido and Hwangryongsan teams and men's matches between the April 25 and Kwanmobong teams and between the Mangyongbong and Pyongyang teams took place on Thursday.
					
					 The tournament continues until October 28.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Arriving here on Thursday were Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, and his party, Alfonso Murgueytio, vice-president of the "Luis Vargas Torres" Esmeraldas University of Technology in Ecuador, and his party, a delegation of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre headed by Chairman Garib Newaz, a delegation of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Chairman Juha Kieksy, a delegation of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions headed by General Secretary Mikhail Panchenko, Thomas Losh, delegate of the Austrian Juche Idea Study Organization, a delegation of the Association for the study of the DPRK of Moscow State University in Russia headed by Chairman Pavel Reshakov, a de
					 legation of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics headed by Chairman Manju Ratna Sakya, a delegation of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Chairman Nikolai Polishk, a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand headed by Chairman Songchit Pullarp, a delegation of the Dutch organization for the study of the Juche Philosophy headed by Chairman Remco Van daal and a far eastern regional delegation for the study of the Juche idea and Songun policy  of Russia headed by Gennady Kulikov.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's 100th Birthday Int'l Committee Formed
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's 100th Birthday Int'l Committee Formed
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- An international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed with due ceremony in the Danish capital of Copenhagen on Oct. 2.
					On display at the venue of the ceremony were works of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on their undying exploits and other photos introducing successes made by the Korean people in the drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Present there were the Nordic preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, Asian-Pacific regional committee, American regional committee and preparatory committees of Russia, France, Switzerland, Pakistan, Nigeria and Egypt, figures of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, representatives of political parties and organizations of Denmark and the friendship delegation of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying homage to them.
					
					 At the ceremony a congratulatory letter of the Nepalese prime minister was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers said that the inauguration of the preparatory committees for splendidly commemorating the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung in various countries and regions of the world is a manifestation of the humble reverence for him.
					
					 They stressed that the international preparatory committee would conduct positive activities and thus make great contribution to significantly commemorating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung as a world-wide grand political festival.
					
					 The ceremony elected Nepalese Prime Minister Madav Kumar Nepal as honorary chairman of the international preparatory committee.
					
					 Co-chairmanship of the committee went to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Raja Labani, deputy secretary general of the Pakistan People's Party, Vladimir Tolstikov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Andre Aubry, delegate president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, Emilia Fernandes, member of the House of Representatives of the National Congress of Brazil, Ibrahim Mantu,  former deputy president of the Senate of the National Assembly of Nigeria, Youssef Amin Wali, vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt, and Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted and the Copenhagen declaration made public at the ceremony.
					
					 The declaration praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man who made undying contributions to global independence.
					
					 The preparatory committees would hold one colorful political and cultural event after another meant to give wide publicity to the history and exploits of the President world-wide and organize international joint celebrations with splendor for commemorating the hundred year history of Kim Il Sung's Korea in the DPRK in April 2012, it said.
					
					 By doing so they will convey down through generations the personality of Kim Il Sung as a great man and his immortal exploits.
					
					 They will expand the solidarity activities supporting the just cause of the Korean people world-wide, the declaration concluded.

articles.title: Letter from Participants of Int'l Committee
articles.content:
Letter from Participants of Int'l Committee
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from the participants of the inaugural ceremony of the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung held in Copenhagen on Oct. 2.
					 The letter said that it is unanimous desire and wish of the world progressives to splendidly commemorate the centenary of birth of the President who commands boundless reverence as a distinguished thinker and theoretician, an outstanding political activist, an invincible strategist and a great sage possessed of noble charisma born in the 20th century for the great feats he performed for the human cause of independence.
					
					 The participants, recognizing in unison the necessity of unified coordination to intensify the commemoration activities now brisk worldwide, formed the preparatory committee and adopted a declaration reflecting the action program to be taken till April in 2012, the letter noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK has demonstrated its might to the whole world as a country of Juche, a country of Songun, weathering all challenges and difficulties of history entirely thanks to the independent policy, bold decision and tested and experienced leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His reelection as general secretary of the WPK at its recent Conference was an expression of the Korean people's boundless reverence and respect and unquestioned trust in him, and all the world progressives are rejoiced over this, extending warm congratulations to him.
					
					 The preparatory committee will organize more splendid and colorful political and cultural events worldwide till significant April in 2012 to hand down to posterity the greatness and immortal exploits of the President and thus fulfill the mission and dusty it assumed before the times and history.

articles.title: Juche Iron Production System Established
articles.content:
Juche Iron Production System Established 
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex established the Juche iron production system based on no-coke high-speed deoxidization in the wake of successfully completing the iron production method by use of Juche iron blast furnace. As a result, the iron production has been put on a normal footing at the complex. 
					 The complex succeeded in integrating the Juche iron production process at new Steel Shop No. 1 with the oxygen furnace now in operation and technologically updated curved type strand-casting machines as a streamlined process. This led to establishing an integral Juche iron production system whereby rolled steel is made from molten iron without being cooled.
					
					 The projects to build a Juche iron production process of Steel Shop No. 1 and introduce the CNC technology to Juche iron blast furnace as required by the IT age also made successful progress.
					
					 Scores of computer programs including a feeding system control program, a furnace observation and control program suited to the specific conditions of locally available raw materials and fuel were developed and command and control rooms for automatically monitoring temperature, pressure and flux of furnace were successfully built to place the Juche iron production on a CNC basis.
					
					 The completion of Korean-style no-coke steel production method based on high-speed deoxidization laid a solid foundation for increasing iron production by completely relying on brown coal abundant in the country.

articles.title: Japans' Moves to Turn into Military Giant Slammed
articles.content:
Japans' Moves to Turn into Military Giant Slammed
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Japan launched H-2A No. 18 carrying satellite Michibiki under the pretext of "eliminating" the weak points of the GPS of the U.S. It was reported that Michibiki would fly over Japan about 8 hours every day as Japan's first GPS satellite. 
					 The Japanese reactionaries are contemplating launching several more satellites of such type in the days ahead, contending that GPS is not enough to have accurate positioning. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is aimed to develop its own GPS, free from the dependence on the GPS of the U.S., in a bid to acquire its independent intelligence-gathering capability for overseas aggression and realize its ambition to turn Japan into a military power.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, claiming that Japan suffered a defeat in the Second World War because it was weak in its power and did not have access to nuclear weapons, have put spurs to the moves to turn Japan into a military power aimed to round off the preparations for overseas aggression, while crying out for the "building of a powerful state".
					
					  It was part of the above-said moves that the Japanese military bosses put their heads together over the issue of beefing up the present strength of the Ground Self-Defence Force as compared with that at present.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are mulling including the issue in the "defense program guidelines" to be worked out at the end of this year.
					
					 What is the height of sarcasm is that they claim the above-said moves are aimed to "protect" Japan from the "attack" of its neighboring countries.
					
					 Japan is waiting for a chance to launch reinvasion against Asia including Korea, while making desperate efforts to beef up its military muscle and adopt a war legislation.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to face up to the change of the times and drop its reckless moves to turn it into a military giant aimed at reinvasion.

articles.title: DFRK Founding Proposal Favoured by Koreans
articles.content:
DFRK Founding Proposal Favoured by Koreans 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Thirty years has lapsed since President Kim Il Sung advanced a proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October Juche 69 (1980).
					 The proposal calls for founding a federal state involving the north and south with the two sides keeping their own ideologies and systems intact.
					
					 Since then, the Korean people have advanced with the implementation of the proposal as the goal in their effort for the country's reunification.
					
					 The drive has become a nationwide movement embracing all Koreans in the north, south and overseas, irrespective of difference in ideology, idea, political view, ism and religious belief.
					
					 The Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification was formed and the DFRK founding proposal has been accepted by Koreans as a reunification formula common to the nation.
					
					 The Korean people's efforts to materialize the proposal have continued on a higher level under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After formulating the Three Principles of National Reunification, the 10-point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the afore-said proposal as the Three Charters for National Reunification, he has energetically led the efforts for their implementation. In particular, he had the historic June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration, a programme for its materialization, adopted between the two parts of Korea to open up a new era of an independent reunification.
					
					 As a result, unprecedented achievements have been scored in developing the inter-Korean relations and pro-reunification movement and all Koreans have turned out in the efforts for national unity and independent reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Korean People Strong in Faith
articles.content:
Korean People Strong in Faith 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea, which traces its origin back to the formation of the Down-with Imperialism Union, has always emerged victorious, producing a large number of people strong in faith.
					 During the hard-fought anti-Japanese struggle, the revolutionary martyrs were infinitely faithful to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, closely rallied around him.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine always remembered by the Korean people as a lifeguard of the President, remained loyal to him with a strong revolutionary faith and obligation from the first day of her revolutionary struggle to the last moment of her life.
					
					 Kim Hyok, Cha Kwang Su and others belonging to the first generation of the Korean revolution respected the President as the sun already at the dawn of the revolution.
					
					 Inheriting their indomitable spirit, the Korean people successfully overcame difficulties and trials with an unbreakable faith in the periods of the Fatherland Liberation War, the postwar rehabilitation and construction and the socialist construction.
					
					Ri In Mo and other unconverted long-term prisoners were steadfast in the belief that the Korean revolution will surely emerge victorious under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. Kil Yong Jo who was a pilot of an air unit of the Korean People's Army and many other people sacrificed themselves for the safety of the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 Among the heroes are 17 servicepersons who saved slogan-bearing trees, precious assets of the Korean revolution, from a wood fire on Mujae Hill and fishermen of the Onchon Fishery Station who kept portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il undamaged, overtaken by a rough storm.
					
					 The building of a thriving nation is being accelerated successfully by the Korean people boundlessly faithful to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK, guided by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth Vow to Take Lead in Reunification Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth Vow to Take Lead in Reunification Movement
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration adopted a resolution at a rally in Seoul last Sunday on the occasion of the third anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The resolution said that the October 4 declaration serves as action guideline as it comprehensively deals with and indicates overall ways for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving the peace of the Korean Peninsula, the prosperity common to the nation and national reunification based on the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations collapsed and the peninsula stands at the crossroads of peace or war after emergence of the Lee Myung Bak "government," it noted.
					
					 The resolution declared that the youth and students would defend to the last the idea of "By our nation itself", the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, and never tolerate any act of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad totally denying the inter-Korean joint declarations and obstructing their implementation.
					
					 It stressed the need for the youth and students organizations to further strengthen solidarity with organizations grouping people of different strata supporting the inter-Korean joint declarations, firmly unite all the patriotic young people desirous of peace and reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" and make positive contributions to expanding and strengthening All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and enhancing its role.
					
					 It called upon the youth to take the lead in the grand march for reunification under the banner of the inter-Korean joint declarations and glorify 2012 marking the fifth anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration as a year of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Celebrated in Guinea
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Celebrated in Guinea
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at Kankan University in Guinea held lectures and a film show from Sept. 25 to 28 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, in a lecture referred in detail to the fact that the WPK set forth a line and policy reflecting the will, desire and interests of the working masses and implemented them to the letter.
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said in a lecture that the WPK has been developed into a tested and experienced party always leading the people to victories despite any tempest and ordeal, and an invincible party commanding the support and trust from all the people.
					
					The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at Kankan University in Guinea noted in a lecture that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has enforced politics based on love and trust in the people as required by the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung long ago.
					
					  The single-minded unity of the DPRK winning the admiration of the world public, the unity more powerful than nukes, would be unthinkable without the benevolent politics of the WPK, he said.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea".

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Marked in Brazil
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Marked in Brazil
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Brazil-Korea Friendship Association issued its bulletin on September 27 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Party serving the people" said that the WPK regarding the Juche idea as its guiding idea is shaping all the line and policies reflecting the demands and desire of the people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, always found himself among the people, listened to them and laid down line and policies fully reflecting their desire and requirements, the bulletin noted, citing concrete facts. 
					
					It stressed that the Songun politics now serving as a basic political mode of the WPK thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the one which most correctly reflects the actual requirements of the country and the desire of the people to live as independent human beings.
					
					 The bulletin recalled that Kim Jong Il unrolled a plan to build a thriving socialist nation in which the national power is strong, everything prospers and the people live well off with nothing to desire more in the world and is leading the struggle to materialize the plan.
					
					 A lot of funds are required for national defence and economic construction under the situation where the DPRK is pushing forward socialist construction despite the U.S. moves against it but the WPK has built modern catering centers, it noted.

articles.title: WPK Praised
articles.content:
WPK Praised
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea released a statement on Sept. 29 in congratulation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The WPK Conference marked a historic event of landmark significance in achieving the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the building of a thriving socialist nation and strengthening and developing the WPK.
					
					 The might of the single-minded unity of the WPK and the Korean people closely rallied behind the leader was strikingly demonstrated and a sure guarantee was provided for the building of a thriving nation through the Conference.
					
					 The WPK, the party of President Kim Il Sung, is further displaying its might as an invincible and iron-willed party under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the WPK as it is commanding the undisputed support and trust from the people by setting forth all line and policies reflecting the desire and interests of the people guided by the Juche idea, and enforcing a benevolent policy, all-embracing one.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Supported in Mexico
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations of Mexico including the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on September 30 on the occasions of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the third anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 President Kim Il Sung advanced the above-said proposal favored by all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad, foreseeing the distant future of the Korean Peninsula with his clairvoyant insight, the statement said, adding that this is an undying feat to shine long in the history of the reunification movement of the Korean nation.
					
					 We are of the view that Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, formulated the three charters for national reunification and provided the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration with his patriotic will for reunification and bold decision, giving a sure guarantee for achieving reunification by federal formula based on the noble patriotic idea of "By our nation itself", and a landmark for the reunification of Korea, the statement noted.
					
					 It denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea for perpetrating such acts against the DPRK, the nation and reunification as escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen, backed by foreign forces, and staging ceaseless madcap joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK together with the U.S., increasing the military tensions on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase. 
					
					 It urged the U.S., the chief architect of the division of Korea, and other countries concerned to own due responsibility for the division of the Korean Peninsula that lasted for more than half a century, refrain from obstructing the reunification of Korea and fulfill their obligations to ensure durable peace and stability of the peninsula.
					
					 It called upon the political parties, governments and organizations the world over desirous of peace, stability and reunification of the peninsula to continue supporting the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to accomplish the cause of national reunification according to the proposal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Works Off Press in Czech Republic and Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Works Off Press in Czech Republic and Cambodia
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary  Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Futra Publishing House of the Czech Republic on Sept. 30.
					 The work, published on Jan. 29, Juche 92 (2003), deals with the idea that the Songun revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Songun policy, is a mighty political mode of the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to arms and serves as a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the era and revolution. It also clarifies the validity and advantages of the Songun policy and its great vitality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Cambodian Antri Miek Publishing House.
					
					 The work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), clarifies the idea that the leadership of the Party provides a sure guarantee for the victory of the cause of socialism, the issue of developing the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche type and the basic ways for fulfilling the mission and duty of the Party as a leading political organization and others.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Oct. 1.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- One winter day in Juche 28 (1939), a unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army led by President Kim Il Sung stayed in Barengou, Antu County.
					 Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk prepared rice cakes together with other servicewomen. On the previous night, President Kim Il Sung said he was afraid that the soldiers felt somewhat hungry. 
					
					 When they were about to put completed rice cakes in vessels, the enemy suddenly attacked the village from all sides. 
					
					 As ordered by the President, the unit quickly left the village and climbed a mountain at the back of the village without harm.
					
					 But Kim Jong Suk ran back to the village through the hail of the enemy's bullets.
					
					 Reaching the house where rice cakes were prepared, she wrapped them in a cloth and escaped from the village, risking her life for a meal of other soldiers.
					
					 Thanks to her devoted effort, they took rice cakes after finishing the battle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia  el "concierto de octubre" de Unhasu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia el "concierto de octubre" de Unhasu
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio junto con los cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito el "concierto de octubre" de Unhasu ofrecido en ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					En el repertorio de la ocasion estuvieron la narracion y solo femenino "Cantamos del partido", el coro "El invicto Partido del Trabajo de Corea", el trio mixto y coro "El dueno de la revolucion es nuestro pueblo", la musica orquestal y coro "Por la revolucion", el solo femenino "Cancion de amor al pueblo" y "Cancion de Pyongyang", el trio masculino "Nuestra nacion es la mejor", la musica orquestal "Las sonrisas", el cuarteto mixto "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo!", la narracion y musica "Cancion de la camaraderia", el coro "Nuestro Lider inolvidable " y otras variadas piezas.
					
					Mediante el concierto, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la trayectoria orgullosa de lucha de 65 anos del PTC, que ha salido siempre victorioso, y la gran epoca del Partido del Trabajo en que el ideal y el deseo anejados del pueblo coreano se materializan exitosamente.
					
					Igualmente, demostraron bien el impetu heroico y la voluntad indoblegable del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que avanzan de viento en popa para cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion de una gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion del PTC.
					
					El Dirigente evaluo altamente los exitos de los ejecutantes y les expreso agradecimiento mostrandose muy contento de que ellos hayan ofrecido este excelente concierto de maximo nivel ideo-artistico que reflejo tal como son la aspiracion y el deseo del pueblo coreano.
					
					Destaco que el PTC escribio la historia de grandes cambios y creaciones en la revolucion y la construccion dirigiendo a las masas populares durante 65 anos y anadio que gracias a la orientacion del gran PTC, el futuro de nuestra patria es siempre maravilloso y la causa revolucionaria de Corea avanzara triunfalmente en todos los tiempos.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, los artistas realizaran ampliamente sus actividades artisticas y creativas para estimular dinamicamente al ejercito y al pueblo de Corea a la lucha por cumplir la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico (BP) del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y Ri Yong Ho; el vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC Kim Jong Un; los miembros del BP del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Pyon Yong Rip, Ri Yong Mu, Ju Sang Song y Hong Sok Hyong; los miembros suplentes del BP del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Thae Nam, Kim Rak Hui, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, U Tong Chuk, Kim Jong Gak y Mun Kyong Dok, los miembros del organo directivo central del PTC y los participantes en la Conferencia del PTC.

articles.title: Ninos de jardin infantil ofrecen funcion artistica
articles.content:
Ninos de jardin infantil ofrecen funcion artistica
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Pyongyang la funcion artistica conjunta de los ninos de jardin infantil de todo el pais denominada "Escena de flores preparada para la fiesta de octubre".
					  La presenciaron Kim Yong Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Thae Nam, Kim Rak Hui y otros cuadros, asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					  En la escena iniciada con el prologo "Fuegos artificiales de la fiesta de octubre" se pusieron el coro masculino y el tamboreo "Crecido como general del monte Paektu", el coro mixto "El mariscal vino a Hoeryong" y otras piezas.
					
					  Los interpretes mostraron vividamente el aspecto feliz de los ninos coreanos que en el regazo del partido fundado por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y guiado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, crecen vigorosamente cultivando sus talentos.
					
					  Y expusieron su decision de formarse como pilares del pais en varias piezas como "Somos ninos Hercules" interpretada en el solo de piano, xilofono e instrumento de percusion  y el baile deportivo "Sere el rey de futbol".

articles.title: Iniciada exposicion de flores en homenaje al 65o aniversario de PTC
articles.content:
Iniciada exposicion de flores en homenaje al 65o aniversario de PTC
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 7 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia la exhibicion de estas flores en homenaje al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					En la ocasion fueron presentadas esas flores del sol cultivadas con esmero por los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, los ministerios, los organos centrales, los compatriotas en ultramar, las representaciones diplomaticas de varios paises y las de organizaciones internacionales, acreditadas en Corea, entidades de amistad y solidaridad, y personalidades extranjeras.
					
					En la ceremonia de apertura estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del PTC Kim Ki Nam, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros Kang Nung Su, el ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun, el grupo de coreanos residentes en Japon que vino aqui para felicitar el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, trabajadores capitalinos y compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					Al pronunciar la palabra inaugural, el presidente del CC de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea, Kim Pyong Hun, dijo que el certamen sera un motivo significativo para mostrar el gran orgullo nacional del ejercito, el pueblo y los compatriotas en ultramar, que tienen de generacion en generacion la fortuna de contar con los lideres y generales excelentes, y para sentir mas profundamente la veneracion ardiente de todo el mundo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente
						 Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe carta de los participantes en constitucion de CPI
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe carta de los participantes en constitucion de CPI
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio la carta que le dirigieran el dia 2 los participantes en la ceremonia de constitucion del comite preparatorio internacional para el 100o aniversario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					  La misiva senala que la unanime aspiracion y el deseo de los pueblos progresistas del mundo son celebrar con solemnidad el centenario de natalicio de Su Excelencia el Presidente Kim Il Sung quien goza de ardiente veneracion como destacado ideologo y teorico, extraordinario activista politico, invencible estratega militar y gran hombre con la noble virtud a quien dio a luz el siglo veinte, por sus grandes hazanas acumuladas ante la causa de independencia de la humanidad.
					
					  Reconociendo unanimemente que se necesita la coordinacion unificada para fomentar aun mas las actividades conmemorativas que se desarrollan con animacion en escala mundial, constituimos el comite preparatorio internacional para el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y aprobamos la declaracion que refleja el plan de acciones a ser efectuadas hasta abril de 2012, subraya el documento.
					
					  Hoy, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea demuestra su poderio a todo el mundo como el pais del Juche, la patria del Songun superando todos los desafios y dificultades de la historia, lo cual se debe a la politica independiente, la audaz decision y la direccion veterana y probada.
					
					  La reeleccion de Su Excelencia como Secretario General en la reciente Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, es una expresion de infinita veneracion, respeto y confianza absoluta del pueblo coreano hacia el, y todos los pueblos progresistas del mundo se alegran al respecto y le rinden el saludo de calurosa felicitacion, destaca.
					
					  El comite preparatorio internacional cumplira con su mision y deber asumidos ante la epoca y la historia al hacer que hasta abril de 2012 se organicen y se efectuen con mas solemnidad en escala mundial variadas actividades politicas y culturales para transmitir eternamente la noble personalidad e inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena lanzamiento de satelites por Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena lanzamiento de satelites por Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, Japon lanzo "H-2A" no. 18, cohete de fabricacion nacional de gran tamano cargado del satelite "Mitsibiki", bajo el pretexto de "corregir" los defectos del "GPS" de Estados Unidos. 
					  "Mitsibiki" es el primer satelite "GPS" de Japon que sobrevolara este pais unas 8 horas al dia.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses planean lanzar en el futuro varios satelites de ese tipo diciendo que el "GPS" norteamericano no es suficiente para localizar correctamente los objetos deseados en el globo terraqueo. 
					
					  Al desarrollar el "GPS" propio, Japon pretende tener la capacidad de recoger, independientemente del "GPS" norteamericano, las informaciones necesarias para la agresion a ultramar y convertirse en una potencia militar. 
					
					  Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y prosigue:
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses piensan en que su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial se debio a la debilidad de fuerzas armadas y a la falta de armas nucleares. Por eso, bajo la consigna de "construccion de un Estado poderoso", vinieron dando acicates a la conversion de su pais en una potencia militar para completar los preparativos para la agresion a ultramar.
					
					  En este contexto, los cabecillas de la capa militar discutieron recientemente el problema de ampliar mucho mas que ahora la estructura de las "Fuerzas Terrestres de Autodefensa". 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses tratan de incluir este problema en el nuevo "programa de defensa" que se aprobara a finales del ano en curso.
					
					  Lo ridiculo del caso es que ellos describen la ampliacion de las "Fuerzas Terrestres de Autodefensa" con fines agresivos como una medida para "defender" su pais del supuesto "ataque" de los paises vecinos.
					
					  Japon acecha la oportunidad de agredir de nuevo a la RPDC y otros paises asiaticos recurriendo freneticamente al aumento armamentista y a la fabricacion de leyes belicas.
					
					  El pais isleno debe darse clara cuenta de la epoca cambiada y poner fin a sus imprudentes maniobras encaminadas a convertirse en una potencia militar para nueva agresion.
